utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Hi there! How can I help?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Oh well, I've tried to go see Aquaman in Reno, Nevada.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay! let me see what we got.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: I found 2 options.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Century Summit Sierra is the first.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: All right, I'll go with that one. When is the next showing today?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: the next showtime is at 3:45.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: All right, can I get three tickets for that?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Sure! let me get those for you!

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: The total for 3 tickets to Aquaman at 3:45 will be $28.44.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: is that okay?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Yeah, that's fine. I just want to know who's starring the film.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Sure, Jason Momoa and Amber Heard are some of the starring actors.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay, that's fine.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: anything else you'd like to know about the movie?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: okay.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: I am really sorry, but this showtime is already sold out. would you like to see if another time has available tickets?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: What about another movie theater?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: let me check!

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: The Century Park Lane 16 has the next show time at 3:10 or 6:40.p.m.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I want the one at 3:10. Is it sold out for if I want to get three tickets?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Let me check, for 3 tickets.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: That seems to be available stilll, shall I book it now?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Yes.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay! one moment!

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: The pricing for those three will be $31.22.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: That's fine.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay!, your tickets have been confirmed and sent to your mobile device.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: All right. Thank you.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: You're very welcome.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Goodbye!
